PUZZLE.original: If a group of four blocks of the same color are arranged to form a square they will become a larger block of that color.
PUZZLE.translated: 当一组同色方块形成正方形时，它们会变成一个同色的大方块。

PUZZLE.original: For each of these larger blocks that are removed the power bar will increase.
PUZZLE.translated: 每消除一个大方块，能量槽就会填充一格。

PUZZLE.original: These larger blocks are removed from the grid by destroying a normal sequence of same colored blocks.
PUZZLE.translated: 消除大方块并不会消除相邻的同色方块。

PUZZLE.original: It takes four large blocks to completely fill the power bar.
PUZZLE.translated: 消除四个大方块即可填满能量槽。

PUZZLE.original: Once removed from the grid any blocks above those removed will fall down to fill the empty spaces.
PUZZLE.translated: 方块消除后，原先在其上方的方块就会下落填补空位。

PUZZLE.original: Once the power bar has been filled once you can use a power up by pressing either ~PAD_X~, ~PAD_Y~, ~PAD_A~ or ~PAD_B~.
PUZZLE.translated: 能量槽填满后，你可以按~PAD_X~~PAD_Y~~PAD_A~~PAD_B~中的一个发动能量特技。

PUZZLE.original: A maximum of three power up uses can be stored for future use by repeatedly filling up the power bar.
PUZZLE.translated: 能量槽可反复填充，但最多只能储存三个能量特技。

PUZZLE.original: Each time empty spaces are removed the score for each block removal gets multiplied.
PUZZLE.translated: 每次消除都会增加消除单位方块可获得的分数。

PUZZLE.original: THE PUZZLE GAME YOU'VE PLAYED BEFORE
PUZZLE.translated: 你　从　前　玩　过　的　益　智　游　戏

PUZZLE.original: Blocks are removed by forming a sequence of four or more similarly colored blocks so their faces are touching.
PUZZLE.translated: 将四个及以上的同色方块连在一起可消除方块。

PUZZLE.original: The falling block is rotated around the central axis by pressing either ~INPUT_KB_LEFT~ or ~INPUT_KB_RIGHT~, or using ~PAD_LSTICK_LEFTRIGHT~.
PUZZLE.translated: 使用~INPUT_KB_LEFT~~INPUT_KB_RIGHT~或~PAD_LSTICK_LEFTRIGHT~可绕中轴旋转下落的方块。

PUZZLE.original: Once the power bar has been filled once you can use a power up by pressing either ~INPUT_FRONTEND_MINIGAME_1~, ~INPUT_FRONTEND_MINIGAME_2~, ~INPUT_FRONTEND_MINIGAME_3~ or ~INPUT_FRONTEND_MINIGAME_4~.
PUZZLE.translated: 能量槽填满后，你可以按~INPUT_FRONTEND_MINIGAME_1~~INPUT_FRONTEND_MINIGAME_2~~INPUT_FRONTEND_MINIGAME_3~~INPUT_FRONTEND_MINIGAME_4~中的一个发动能量特技。

PUZZLE.original: Randomly colored blocks are created at the top of the screen and will fall down the grid.
PUZZLE.translated: 随机颜色的方块会从屏幕顶端落下。

PUZZLE.original: The aim of the game is to prevent the colored blocks from reaching the top of the grid.
PUZZLE.translated: 此游戏以不让彩色方块堆到网格顶端为目标。

PUZZLE.original: YOU'LL NEED TO DO BETTER THAN THAT TO ENTER THE HI-SCORE TABLE!
PUZZLE.translated: 你需要更高的得分才能登录排行榜！

PUZZLE.original: Using ~PAD_DPAD_DOWN~ or ~PAD_LSTICK_DOWN~ will increase the speed at which the blocks fall.
